charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1101_0100_2:
While walking around town,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Larry, who
had a bit of a spring to his step.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_0300_1:
Are you on your lunch break too? I just ate at
a nice restaurant.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_0400_1:
The price was reasonable, and the waiter even
gave me something on the house.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_0500_1:
Pasio is actually an excellent place. There are a
lot of great restaurants, you know.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_0401_0700_1:
Yes. At first, I was under the impression that
Pasio was just a tourist spot, but I have to say I’m
impressed.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_0401_0800_1:
The trick is to look for the small restaurants where
employees eat, not the famous places that target
tourists.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_0402_1100_1:
I suppose I am in a bit of a good mood, now that
I’ve found a great place to get lunch.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_1200_1:
Hm, I still have some time before my break
is over...
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_1300_1:
If you’re not going anywhere, is there anything
you’d like to talk about with me?
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_0401_1500_1:
Interested in my partner Pokémon? Sure, I can
give you a quick presentation...
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_0402_1700_1: I suppose so... He stands out, doesn’t he?
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_0402_1800_1:
Well then, would you like to learn about
Dudunsparce?
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_2000_1:
Officially, they’re called Two-Segment Form
and Three-Segment Form.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_2100_1: Mine is a Two-Segment Form Dudunsparce.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_2200_1:
Three-Segment Form Dudunsparce is rarer and
harder to find.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_2300_1:
But personally, I appreciate the Two-Segment
Form. It has its own charm.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_2400_1:
It puts me more at ease than something
exceptional... I’m just an average, everyday joe,
after all.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_2500_1:
If the only special treatment I get is a restaurant
giving me a free side, that’s enough for me.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_2700_1:
If Two-Segment Form is called Dudunsparce,
shouldn’t Three-Segment Form be called
Dududunsparce?
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_2900_1:
Which do you like better? Two-Segment Form
or Three-Segment Form? Average or exceptional?
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_0401_3100_1: Is that so? You and I have similar tastes, then.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_0402_3300_1: I see... You know, my boss said the same thing.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_3400_1:
I think have a better idea of your preferences
now.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_3500_1:
I think people expect you to be exceptional,
whether you’re trying to be or not.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_3600_1:
I can tell. You’re the kind of person who’s capable
of excelling at many things.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_3700_1: ...I don’t think I could handle being like that.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_3800_1: Simplicity is best—at work and in life.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_3900_1: Oh. Thank you for the reminder, Dudunsparce.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_4000_1:
That boss of mine will give me an earful if she
catches me returning to work late again.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_4100_1: I suppose I should head back. I’ll see you around.
charaepi_ch0304_00_aoki/2301_1201_4200_1:
...One of these days, let’s get a bite to eat
together.
